name: Tron Escape
description:
Here it is, my first game for the VG5000 : TRON ESCAPE

Trapped in old 8bit computers, you must escape by defeating the RAM, ROM, DATA BUS and CPU of each system !

The game was programmed in BASIC during summer 2022 for the first session of the "Retro Programmers United for Obscure Systems" challenge.

Link to learn more and join us : https://www.facebook.com/groups/1161811471271807
